song_lyrics: BAPS shatābdī mahotsav...
BAPS shatābdī mahotsav...
BAPS parivār ye, shatābdī varṣha manāye,
Abhivandan abhivandan abhivandan abhivandan...
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam kī jay ho, shatābdī varṣha kī jaya ho,
Pramukh Swāmī ke pyār se, BAPS parivār ye,
Sab ko kare abhivandan... sab kā kare abhinandan,
Abhivandan... abhivandan... 1
Pramukh Swāmīne hame sīkhāyā sab se mīlakar rahenā,
Ham sanātan hai ātmā sab kī mahimā kahenā,
Dayā rakhe sab jīv prāṇī me, amṛut vahāve ham vāṇī me,
Īshvar kī santān, sab me hai Bhagwān,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam kī jay ho... 2
Shāstrījī Mahārāj kī jay ho, Yogījī Mahārāj kī jay ho,
Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj kī jay ho, jay ho, jay ho,
Shāstrī Yogī Pramukh Swāmīne ham sabhī ko apanāyā,
Swāminārāyaṇ nād jagāyā, sanskṛuti dharma felāyā,
Bāl yuvā mandir rache hai, jan uddhārak kendra bane hai,
Sarvoparī hai nām, vo hai Akṣhardhām,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam kī jay ho... 3
Ham hai BAPS ke sūtradhār,
Vishva shānti aur sanskṛuti kī hāth me līye mashāl,
Jay ho, jay ho, jay ho, jay ho...
BAPS kī jay ho, shatābdī varṣha kī jay ho...
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam kī jay ho... 4
title: BAPS parivār ye shatābdī varṣha manāye

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1039: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Nrutya Gito
